title: ISSUE: Randomly Disconnecting In game for up to 15 Seconds
body:
Has been Happening for awhile it will randomly disconnect and attempt to reconnect for roughly 15 seconds sometimes up to 10 times per game, it really makes the game unplayable, it only happends when im using my PC its not the WIFI because im the only one who gets disconnected and it only happends while in game on leauge, i have tryed using a MAC on the same network to play and theres no problem, also use my laptop at my friends house to play and also no issue or dropouts, Hope to get a fix , 
Regards

replies.body:
There may be a bad configuration locally on that PC that is causing this issue. To ensure your settings are compatible with League, I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in its entirety.

Let me know if those steps caused any noticeable change.
